item.title: Disable Chrome browser confirmation to open external protocol with org-protocol
item.description: I recently added org-capture chrome extension to my toolbelt. Unfortunalely chrome annoys me by asking if I want to open this protocol link every time. Here is the simple way to fix this. Execute this in the shell defaults write com.google.Chrome URLAllowlist -array-add -string 'org-protocol://*' check chrome://policy url that it contains proper settings for org-protocol
